Type.title: Identification type
Type.description: Fiscal or register id of an entity, depends on the type or the country (VAT or others)

Number.title: Identification number or code
Number.description: The specific number or code that represents an identifier of the company

CheckCode.title: Check code
CheckCode.description: Additional code for identification number verification, such as Digito Verificador in Colombia

Address.title: The Address data type
Address.description: Data typed used for any address.The GeoLevel1 must be used for the most generic location, using the rest in order for more specific locations

FullAddress.title: Full Address
FullAddress.description: Full address in an unique field
examples: C/ GRAHAM BELL, Nº 1, POL. IND. SAN ISIDRO, EDIF. AXESOR

ZIPCode.title: ZIP code of the address
ZIPCode.description: ZIP code of the addres, using local classification

GeoLevel1.title: Level 1 of administrative division
GeoLevel1.description: Depending on the country, the largest unit region for the address

GeoLevel2.title: Level 2 of administrative division
GeoLevel2.description: Depending on the country, the second unit region for the address

GeoLevel3.title: Level 3 of administrative division
GeoLevel3.description: Depending on the country, the third unit region for the address

GeoLevel4.title: Level 4 of administrative division
GeoLevel4.description: Depending on the country, the smallest unit region for the address

CountryISO.title: Country (ISO)
CountryISO.description: The three-digit ISO code for the country of the addresss

Status.title: Official status of the address
Status.description: Local details concerning the current status of the address

OtherDetail.title: Additional info for the address
OtherDetail.description: Any other detail concerning the address

Classification.title: Activity classification system
Classification.description: Classification system used for the current activity (NACE or others)

Version.title: Activity classification system version
Version.description: Classification system version used for the current activity

Code.title: Activity code
Code.description: Activity code according to the classification system

Description.title: Activity description
Description.description: Detailed text describing the activity of the entity
examples: Proceso de datos, hosting y actividades relacionadas

CoreBusiness.title: Main Activity indicador
CoreBusiness.description: Indicates if this activity is the main activity of the company or not

Amount.title: The Amount data type
Amount.description: Contains specific information about any amount used in the JSON

CurrencyISO.title: Sales currency
CurrencyISO.description: ISO code describing the currency used for the sales data

Value.title: Sales amount
Value.description: Total amount or minimum value in case of range

RangeMax.title: Range: Maximum Amount
RangeMax.description: Maximum value  in case of range

Estimated.title: Estimated Sales
Estimated.description: True if the amount is estimated (not the actual amount)

HelpText.title: Help text
HelpText.description: Short generic explanation about the content of the amount data

AmountBreakdown.title: Amount breakdown
AmountBreakdown.description: Any breakdown related to the parent amount or range

BreakdownType.title: Breakdown type
BreakdownType.description: Describes and sorts specific breakdowns of the amount or range

Description.title: Breakdown value description
Description.description: Text with the detail of the child value

CurrencyISO.title: Sales currency
CurrencyISO.description: ISO code describing the currency used for the child data

Value.title: Sales amount
Value.description: Child amount for the selected period or minimum value in case of range

RangeMax.title: Range: Maximum Sales
RangeMax.description: Maximum value of the child value in case of range

Percentage.title: Percentage of sales
Percentage.description: Shows the child value in percentage

HelpText.title: Help text
HelpText.description: Short generic explanation about the content of the child data

Employees.title: The Employees data type
Employees.description: Contains specific information about the number od employees of the entity

EmployeesNumber.title: Number of employees
EmployeesNumber.description: Number of employees for the selected period or minimum value in case of range

RangeMaxEmployees.title: Range: Maximum Employees
RangeMaxEmployees.description: Maximum value of the number of employees in case of range

Estimated.title: Estimated Employees
Estimated.description: True if the number of employees is estimated (not the actual)

MeasureType.title: Employees' type of measure
MeasureType.description: Shows if the Employees number is the total number or the average number

HelpText.title: Help text
HelpText.description: Short generic explanation about the content of the amount data

EmployeesBreakdown.title: Employees breakdown
EmployeesBreakdown.description: Any employees breakdown related to the employees parent value or range

BreakdownType.title: Breakdown type
BreakdownType.description: Describes and sorts specific breakdowns of the employees number or range

Description.title: Breakdown value description
Description.description: Text with the detail of the child value

MeasureType.title: Employees' type of measure
MeasureType.description: Shows if the child value is the total number or the average number

EmployeesNumber.title: Employees number
EmployeesNumber.description: Child sales amount for the selected period or minimum value in case of range

RangeMax.title: Range: Maximum employees
RangeMax.description: Maximum value of the child value in case of range

Percentage.title: Percentage of employees
